ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Subscription Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Does this answer your question Papa???   Eq toys spawning in offices??? What s next, a replica Misty Thicket popping up in our web development team s home
ygData.messageBody:
Does this answer your question Papa??? Eq toys spawning in offices???
What's next, a replica Misty Thicket popping up in our web development
team's home "zone". "Careful you don't aggro Mooto, it's a long run to the
guards"

Sometimes you just have to know when to drop the chalupa and back away
slowly. ;-)

Kitasi

> What is the big deal with making EQ toys?
>
> I don't understand why this bothers people...
>
> Please explain.

The problem is their too small! When I first heard these were being
designed the person who posted it made a bit of a typo and stated the toys
would be between 6 inches and 8 feet. (Was that on this list?) Here we
were, all plotting which co-workers cubicles we'd choose as spawn points for
giant (four foot we figured) spiders, debating whether to place Broon or a
Seafury Cyclopse in our front yards, wondering if willowisps would include
batteries, and if so, would they be dead...

;^)
Peace
Evulia, proud owner of TWO Ruins of Kunark (tight ship, that Verant)
